title: Free Stock Footage - California Agriculture Cornfield Aerial Drone Flyover 4k

subtasks: Approach the grain bin
Open the grain bin door
Suspend grain auger into the bin
Connect grain auger to bin spout
Position truck bed underneath auger discharge
Engage grain auger
Monitor auger operation and truck filling
Stop auger when truck is full
Disengage auger and disconnect
Close grain bin door

tasks.task: Driving the truck to grain storage location
subtasks: Enter the driver's seat
Adjust seat and mirrors
Start the truck engine
Back the truck out of the loading area
Proceed to the grain storage or processing facility

tasks.task: Unloading grain from the truck at the storage location
subtasks: Align truck bed with unloading area
Engage truck unload mechanism
Open the truck tailgate
Discharge grain from truck into storage
Monitor grain level and adjust as needed
Close truck tailgate and disengage unload mechanism
Return the truck to the field or original location
